ClassDesc: GooglePlayServicesAvailabilityExceptions are special instances of @B_com#google#android#gms#auth#UserRecoverableAuthException_E@s which are thrown when the expected Google Play services app is not available for some reason. In these cases client code can use @B_com#google#android#gms#auth#GooglePlayServicesAvailabilityException#getConnectionStatusCode_E@ in conjunction with @B_com#google#android#gms#common#GooglePlayServicesUtil#getErrorDialog_E@ to provide users with a localized @B_android#app#Dialog_E@ that will allow users to install, update, or otherwise enable Google Play services.
